product_name: The North Face Arroyo Cargo Pants - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: The midweight ripstop Arroyo Cargo pants from The North Face are rugged enough to handle maintenance work in your backyard yet comfortable enough for a casual day out with friends. Ripstop cotton fabric is soft for great comfort. Slash hand pockets, back flap pockets and two cargo pockets offer up plenty of storage space. Triple-needle stitching at critical seams adds durability. Articulated knees allow comfortable range of motion with no tugging.
short_description: The midweight ripstop Arroyo Cargo pants from The North Face are rugged enough to handle maintenance work in your backyard yet comfortable enough for a casual day out with friends.
